content: @Bryn Rhodes @Brett Marquard @Eric Haas @Rick Geimer @Lloyd McKenzie one thing you all need to do in the next 48 hours is create a changes.txt file in the root of the IG that has a series of text/html notes suitable for a <ul> that describes the significant changes between the last balloted version of the IG, and the present version.
This is the first ballot for C-CDA on FHIR so we should be good without that, yeah?
btw, reworking the IG for the publication tooling is not relevant to implementers, so don't list that
I will build the content in the file into the IG histroy when I publish the ballot content
for CCDA, yes, no change list needed. I couldn't remember whether it was first or not
This is the first ballot of C-CDA on FHIR, so assume no changes file needed, right?
Oops, Sarah already responded to that, so ignore mine, just catching up.
